What is SolarCoin?

A global rewards program for solar electricity generation.

ยง1 SolarCoin represents 1 MWh of solar electricity generation. As a verified solar electricity producer, you may get SolarCoins for free. 99% of SolarCoins will be given to solar electricity producers of 97,500 TWh over 40 yrs.
